languages.text: "Тогда... загляните в себя. Услышьте зов предков сквозь Атлас, как слышу его я. Взгляните моими глазами на то, что я видела. Одолжите мне свою силу, и вместе... вместе мы поможем Дому Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда... загляните в себя. Услышьте зов предков сквозь Атлас, как слышу его я. Взгляните моими глазами на то, что я видела. Одолжите мне свою силу, и вместе... вместе мы поможем Дому Орселлио".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
languages.original_text: "Тогда... загляните в себя. Услышьте зов предков сквозь Атлас, как слышу его я. Взгляните моими глазами на то, что я видела. Одолжите мне свою силу, и вместе... вместе мы поможем Дому Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inwards. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inwards. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「では…内面を見つめるのです。あたくしのように、アトラスから聞こえる父祖の声に耳を傾けて。あたくしの目をとおしてあたくしが見てきた何もかもを見るのです。あなたの力を貸して、共に…共に、この苦境からオーセリオ家を解放するのです」
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: 「では…内面を見つめるのです。あたくしのように、アトラスから聞こえる父祖の声に耳を傾けて。あたくしの目をとおしてあたくしが見てきた何もかもを見るのです。あなたの力を貸して、共に…共に、この苦境からオーセリオ家を解放するのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “然后……看着你的内心，像我一样，通过圣仪的力量聆听先祖的呼唤。透过我的眼睛，看看我所看到的一切。把你们的力量借给我，让我们一起……一起把奥赛罗家族从困境中解决出来。”
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: “然后……看着你的内心，像我一样，通过圣仪的力量聆听先祖的呼唤。透过我的眼睛，看看我所看到的一切。把你们的力量借给我，让我们一起……一起把奥塞罗家族从困境中解决出来。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas... ouvrez les yeux. Concentrez-vous sur l'Atlas. Entendez l'appel de nos ancêtres. Voyez tout ce qu'il m'a été donné de voir. Prêtez-moi votre force, et ensemble... ensemble, nous aiderons la maison Orsellio à se relever. »
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas... ouvrez les yeux. Concentrez-vous sur l'Atlas. Entendez l'appel de nos ancêtres. Voyez tout ce qu'il m'a été donné de voir. Prêtez-moi votre force, et ensemble... ensemble, nous aiderons la maison Orsellio à se relever. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces... mirad a vuestro interior. Escuchad la llamada de nuestros ancestros a través del Atlas, al igual que yo. Mirad a través de mis ojos y ved todo lo que yo he visto. Concededme vuestra fuerza, y juntos... juntos, libraremos a la casa Orsellio de todo su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces... mirad a vuestro interior. Escuchad la llamada de nuestros ancestros a través del Atlas, al igual que yo. Mirad a través de mis ojos y ved todo lo que yo he visto. Concededme vuestra fuerza, y juntos... juntos, libraremos a la casa Orsellio de todo su sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dann ... blickt nach innen. Hört den Ruf der Ahnen durch den Atlas, wie ich ihn höre. Blickt durch meine Augen auf alles, was ich gesehen habe. Leiht mir Eure Kraft, und gemeinsam ... gemeinsam werden wir Haus Orsellio aus seiner Hot befreien."
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ... blickt nach innen. Hört den Ruf der Ahnen durch den Atlas, wie ich ihn höre. Blickt durch meine Augen auf alles, was ich gesehen habe. Leiht mir Eure Kraft, und gemeinsam ... gemeinsam werden wir Haus Orsellio aus seiner Hot befreien."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde... Kendi içine bak. Benim yaptığım gibi Atlas ile atalarımızın çağrısına kulak ver. Gözlerimle gördüklerime tanık ol. Bana kendi gücünü bahşet. Sonra da birlikte Orsellio Hanesi'ni bu dertten kurtaralım."
languages.original_text: "Then... peer inward. Heed the ancestors' call through the Atlas as I do. Look through my eyes upon all that I have seen. Lend me your strength, and together... together, we shall deliver House Orsellio from its plights."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde... Kendi içinize bakın. Benim yaptığım gibi, Atlas'ın içinden atalarımızın çağrısına kulak verin. Gözlerimle gördüklerime tanık olun. Bana kendi gücünüzü bahşedin... Böylece birlikte Orsellio Hanesi'ni bu dertten kurtaralım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
